topics.body:
I had the weirdest dream.

I was in an alternate dimension, everyone I knew acted differently and they were all chibis. I got sent to jail for not being a chibi and spent there for a week before escaping through the sewers made of candy. After escaping, I was suddenly in some town that a World War 2 winter feeling. I escaped with a bunch of other non-chibis and then we deep fried a corncob and a pizza. We later went shopping.

Weirdest part was that I was entirely calm about it. Almost all of my dream end up with me screaming, laughing or some other expressed emotion.
topics.author: 4fe1b9f47f123b13df002976
